trans-unit.source: Represents an MSBuild project, a targets file, or any other file that conforms to MSBuild project file schema.
trans-unit.target: MSBuild 專案檔案結構描述代表 MSBuild 專案中，目標檔案或任何其他符合的檔案。

trans-unit.source: This class and its related classes allow a complete MSBuild project or targets file to be read and written.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別及其相關的類別允許完整 MSBuild 專案檔或 targets 檔可以讀取和寫入。

trans-unit.source: Comments and white space cannot be edited through this model at present.
trans-unit.target: 註解和空格無法透過此模型的編輯。

trans-unit.source: Each project root element is associated with exactly one project collection.
trans-unit.target: 每個專案的根項目是一個專案集合相關聯。

trans-unit.source: This allows the owner of that project collection to control its lifetime and not be surprised by edits that come from another project collection.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓該專案集合的擁有者，來控制其存留期，並不會很訝異來自另一個專案集合的編輯。

trans-unit.source: Adds a project import to this project.
trans-unit.target: 將專案匯入加入至這個專案。

trans-unit.source: If import groups exist, inserts the project import into the last import group that has no Condition attribute; otherwise, creates an import at the end of the project.
trans-unit.target: 如果匯入群組存在，將專案匯入插入的最後一個匯入群組沒有條件屬性。否則，請建立匯入專案的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The project to be imported.
trans-unit.target: 要匯入專案。

trans-unit.source: Returns the added project import.
trans-unit.target: 傳回加入的專案匯入。

trans-unit.source: Creates an import group at the end of this project.
trans-unit.target: 建立匯入群組，此專案的結尾。

trans-unit.source: This convenience method picks a location in the MSBuild DOM based on a heuristic.
trans-unit.target: 這個便利的方法會根據啟發學習法 MSBuild DOM 中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the import group created at the end of this project.
trans-unit.target: 傳回建立此專案結尾處的匯入群組。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to this project.
trans-unit.target: 此專案中加入項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates an item, then adds it to an item group with no Condition attribute and at least one item of same item type.
trans-unit.target: 建立項目，然後加入沒有條件屬性與項目群組，和至少一個項目相同的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: If no such item group is found, creates a new item group and adds the item to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到這類的項目群組，則會建立新的項目群組，並新增項目。

trans-unit.source: Items are ordered by Include values.
trans-unit.target: 所包含的值來排序項目。

trans-unit.source: Does nothing if the item matches an existing wildcard expression for this item type.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目符合現有的萬用字元運算式，這個項目類型，請就沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: The item type of the item to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入之項目的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: The Include value of the item to be added.
trans-unit.target: 包含要加入之項目的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the added item.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新增的項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item with metadata to this project.
trans-unit.target: 將中繼資料的項目加入至這個專案。

trans-unit.source: Creates an item, then adds it to an item group with no Condition attribute and at least one item of same item type.
trans-unit.target: 建立項目，然後加入沒有條件屬性與項目群組，和至少一個項目相同的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: If no such item group is found, creates a new item group and adds the item to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到這類的項目群組，則會建立新的項目群組，並新增項目。

trans-unit.source: Items are ordered by Include values.
trans-unit.target: 所包含的值來排序項目。

trans-unit.source: The item type of the item to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入之項目的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: The Include value of the item to be added.
trans-unit.target: 包含要加入之項目的值。

trans-unit.source: The metadata to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Returns the added item.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新增的項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item definition to this project.
trans-unit.target: 將項目定義加入至這個專案。

trans-unit.source: Creates an item, then adds it to an item group with no Condition attribute and at least one item of same item type.
trans-unit.target: 建立項目，然後加入沒有條件屬性與項目群組，和至少一個項目相同的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: If no such item group is found, creates a new item group and adds the item to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到這類的項目群組，則會建立新的項目群組，並新增項目。

trans-unit.source: Items are ordered by Include values.
trans-unit.target: 所包含的值來排序項目。

trans-unit.source: The item type of the item definition to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的項目定義項目類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the added item definition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新增的項目定義。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item definition group to this project.
trans-unit.target: 將項目定義群組加入至這個專案。

trans-unit.source: Creates and adds an item definition group after the last existing item definition group, if any.
trans-unit.target: 建立並將項目定義群組的最後一個現有的項目定義群組之後，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, creates an item definition group after the last existing property group, if any.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果有的話，請最後一個現有的屬性群組之後, 建立項目定義群組。

trans-unit.source: If no property group exists, creates a new item definition group at the end of the project.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何屬性群組，會建立新的項目定義群組結尾的專案。

trans-unit.source: Returns the added item definition group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新增的項目定義群組。

trans-unit.source: Creates and adds an item group to this project.
trans-unit.target: 建立並將此專案的項目群組。

trans-unit.source: Creates and adds an item group after the last existing item group, if any.
trans-unit.target: 建立並將項目群組最後一個現有的項目群組之後，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, creates an item group after the last existing property group, if any.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果有的話，請最後一個現有的屬性群組之後, 建立項目群組。

trans-unit.source: If no property group exists, creates a new item group at the end of the project.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何屬性群組存在，請建立新的項目群組在專案結尾處。

trans-unit.source: Returns the added item group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新增的項目群組。

trans-unit.source: Updates or adds a property to this project.
trans-unit.target: 更新或將屬性加入至這個專案。

trans-unit.source: Updates the last existing property with the specified `name` that has no Condition attribute on itself or on the property group that contains it.
trans-unit.target: 更新最後一個現有的屬性以指定`name`本身或包含它的屬性群組上具有沒有條件屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, creates a property and adds it to the first property group that has no Condition attribute.
trans-unit.target: 否則，建立屬性，並將它加入至屬性群組的第一個沒有條件屬性。

trans-unit.source: If no such property group exists, creates a property group after the last existing property group, if any, and adds the property to it .
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這類屬性群組存在，最後一個現有的屬性群組之後, 會建立屬性群組，如果有的話，將屬性加入它。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, creates and adds a property group to the start of the project, and adds the property to it.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會建立並將屬性群組加入至專案，開始並將屬性加入至它。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to be updated or added.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新或加入屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property to be updated or added.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新或加入屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the updated or added property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的更新或已新增的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new property group to this project.
trans-unit.target: 此專案中加入新的屬性群組。

trans-unit.source: Creates a property group and adds it after the last existing property group, if any.
trans-unit.target: 建立屬性群組，並將其最後一個現有的屬性群組之後，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, adds the property group to the start of the project.
trans-unit.target: 否則，屬性將群組加入至專案開始。

trans-unit.source: Returns the added property group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回加入之屬性群組。

trans-unit.source: Adds a target to the project.
trans-unit.target: 將目標加入至專案。

trans-unit.source: Convenience method that picks a location based on a heuristic: Creates a target at the end of the project.
trans-unit.target: 根據啟發學習法的便利的方法會挑選一個位置︰ 在專案結尾處建立目標。

trans-unit.source: The name of the target to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入目標的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the added target.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已加入的目標。

trans-unit.source: Adds a [UsingTask Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) to the project.
trans-unit.target: 新增[UsingTask 項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)至專案。

trans-unit.source: Either the `assemblyName` or `assemblyFile` must be null, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 可能是`assemblyName`或`assemblyFile`必須是 null，但非兩者。

trans-unit.source: The task name.
trans-unit.target: 工作名稱。

trans-unit.source: The file path to the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly to load.
trans-unit.target: 要載入的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the added UsingTask element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回加入的 UsingTask 項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets all child [Choose Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有子項目[選擇的項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)此專案中。

trans-unit.source: Returns all child Choose elements.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所有子系選擇項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets null because the Condition attribute is nonexistent for this element and a nonexistent condition is implicitly true.
trans-unit.target: 因為條件屬性不存在這個項目的並不存在的條件是以隱含方式，則為 true，則取得則為 null。

trans-unit.source: Returns a null.
trans-unit.target: 會傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Do not use.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用。

trans-unit.source: The Condition attribute is nonexistent for <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectRootElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Condition 屬性不存在的<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectRootElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Get throws an internal error.
trans-unit.target: 取得擲回內部錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Throws an internal error and returns null.
trans-unit.target: 擲回內部錯誤，則傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Creates and initializes an in-memory, empty ProjectRootElement instance and adds it to the global project collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化記憶體中的空白 ProjectRootElement 執行個體，並將它加入至全域專案集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the new project root.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新的專案根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Creates and initializes an in-memory, empty ProjectRootElement instance and adds it to the specified project collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化記憶體中的空白 ProjectRootElement 執行個體，並將它加入至指定的專案集合。

trans-unit.source: The project collection to be added to.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入至專案集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the new project root.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新的專案根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Creates and initializes an in-memory, empty ProjectRootElement instance and adds it to the global project collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化記憶體中的空白 ProjectRootElement 執行個體，並將它加入至全域專案集合。

trans-unit.source: The new project root is initialized from data found at the specified file path.
trans-unit.target: 新的專案根目錄會從指定的檔案路徑，請參閱資料初始化。

trans-unit.source: The file path to the data used for initialization.
trans-unit.target: 用於初始化的資料檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the new project root.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新的專案根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Creates and initializes an in-memory, empty ProjectRootElement instance and adds it to the global project collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化記憶體中的空白 ProjectRootElement 執行個體，並將它加入至全域專案集合。

trans-unit.source: The new project root is initialized from data read from the specified XmlReader.
trans-unit.target: 新的專案根目錄會從讀取自指定的 XmlReader 資料初始化。

trans-unit.source: May throw InvalidProjectFileException.
trans-unit.target: 可能會擲回 InvalidProjectFileException。

trans-unit.source: The XML reader used for initialization.
trans-unit.target: 用於初始化 XML 讀取器。

trans-unit.source: Returns the new project root.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新的專案根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Creates and initializes an in-memory, empty ProjectRootElement instance and adds it to the specified project collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化記憶體中的空白 ProjectRootElement 執行個體，並將它加入至指定的專案集合。

trans-unit.source: The new project root is initialized from data found at the specified file path.
trans-unit.target: 新的專案根目錄會從指定的檔案路徑，請參閱資料初始化。

trans-unit.source: The file path to the data used for initialization.
trans-unit.target: 用於初始化的資料檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The project collection to be added to.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入至專案集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the new project root.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新的專案根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Creates and initializes an in-memory, empty ProjectRootElement instance and adds it to the specified project collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化記憶體中的空白 ProjectRootElement 執行個體，並將它加入至指定的專案集合。

trans-unit.source: The new project root is initialized from data read from the specified XmlReader.
trans-unit.target: 新的專案根目錄會從讀取自指定的 XmlReader 資料初始化。

trans-unit.source: May throw InvalidProjectFileException.
trans-unit.target: 可能會擲回 InvalidProjectFileException。

trans-unit.source: The XML reader used for initialization.
trans-unit.target: 用於初始化 XML 讀取器。

trans-unit.source: The project collection to be added to.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入至專案集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the new project root.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新的專案根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Creates a [Choose Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 建立[選擇項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the Choose element to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將 選擇項目加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectChooseElement"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectChooseElement"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Creates an [Import Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 建立[匯入項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the Import element to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將匯入項目加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: The project to be imported.
trans-unit.target: 要匯入專案。

trans-unit.source: Returns the created Import element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回建立的匯入項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates an import group.
trans-unit.target: 建立匯入群組。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the import group to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將匯入群組加入至專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the import group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的匯入群組。

trans-unit.source: Creates an item definition.
trans-unit.target: 建立項目定義。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the item definition to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將項目定義加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: The item type of the item definition.
trans-unit.target: 項目定義的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item definition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的項目定義。

trans-unit.source: Creates an item definition group.
trans-unit.target: 建立項目定義群組。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the item definition group to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將項目定義群組加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item definition group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的項目定義群組。

trans-unit.source: Creates an item.
trans-unit.target: 建立項目。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the item to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將項目加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: The item type of the item.
trans-unit.target: 項目的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates an item with the specifed Include value.
trans-unit.target: 建立具有指定的包含值的項目。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the item to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將項目加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: The item type of the item.
trans-unit.target: 項目的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: The Include value of the item.
trans-unit.target: 包含項目的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates an item group.
trans-unit.target: 建立項目群組。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the item group to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將項目群組加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的項目群組。

trans-unit.source: Creates a metadata node with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 建立具有指定名稱的中繼資料節點。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the metadata node to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將中繼資料節點新增到專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the metadata node.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的中繼資料節點。

trans-unit.source: Creates a metadata node with the specified name and value.
trans-unit.target: 建立具有指定的名稱和值的中繼資料節點。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the metadata node to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將中繼資料節點新增到專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the metadata element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回中繼資料的項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates an [OnError Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 建立[OnError 項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the OnError element to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將 OnError 項目加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: The targets to execute if a task fails.
trans-unit.target: 執行工作失敗時的目標。

trans-unit.source: Returns the OnError element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 OnError 項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates an [Otherwise Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 建立[Otherwise 項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add it to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將它加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the Otherwise element to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將否則項目加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Otherwise element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回否則項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates an [Output Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 建立[輸出項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the Output element to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將輸出項目加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: Either itemType or propertyName must be specified, but not both.
trans-unit.target: ItemType 或 propertyName 必須指定，但非兩者皆是。

trans-unit.source: The name of the task's output parameter.
trans-unit.target: 工作名稱的輸出參數。

trans-unit.source: The item that receives the task's output parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 接收工作項目之輸出參數值。

trans-unit.source: The property that receives the task's output parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 接收工作的屬性的輸出參數值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Output element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回輸出項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a [ProjectExtensions Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 建立[ProjectExtensions 項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the ProjectExtensions element to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將 ProjectExtensions 項目加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ProjectExtensions element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 ProjectExtensions 項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a property.
trans-unit.target: 建立的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the property to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將屬性加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a property group.
trans-unit.target: 建立屬性群組。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the property group to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須在專案中所選擇的位置加入屬性群組。

trans-unit.source: Returns the property group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的屬性群組。

trans-unit.source: Creates a target.
trans-unit.target: 建立目標。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the target to the location of choice in this project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將目標加入至這個專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the target.
trans-unit.target: 目標的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the target.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目標。

trans-unit.source: Creates a task.
trans-unit.target: 建立的工作。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the task to the location of choice in this project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將工作加入此專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the task.
trans-unit.target: 工作的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the task.
trans-unit.target: 傳回工作。

trans-unit.source: Creates a task to be referenced by a [UsingTask Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 建立所參考的工作[UsingTask 項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the task to the UsingTask element of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將工作加入專案中所選擇的 UsingTask 項目。

trans-unit.source: The string to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要評估的字串。

trans-unit.source: The body to add.
trans-unit.target: 若要新增主體。

trans-unit.source: Returns the task.
trans-unit.target: 傳回工作。

trans-unit.source: Adds a [UsingTask Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) to the project.
trans-unit.target: 新增[UsingTask 項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)至專案。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the UsingTask element to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將 UsingTask 項目加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: Either the `assemblyName` or `assemblyFile` must be null, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 可能是`assemblyName`或`assemblyFile`必須是 null，但非兩者。

trans-unit.source: The task name.
trans-unit.target: 工作名稱。

trans-unit.source: The file path to the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly to load.
trans-unit.target: 要載入的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the UsingTask element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 UsingTask 項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds a [UsingTask Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) to the project.
trans-unit.target: 新增[UsingTask 項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)至專案。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the UsingTask element to the location of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將 UsingTask 項目加入專案中所選擇的位置。

trans-unit.source: Either the `assemblyName` or `assemblyFile` must be null, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 可能是`assemblyName`或`assemblyFile`必須是 null，但非兩者。

trans-unit.source: Both the `runtime` and `architecture` can be null.
trans-unit.target: 同時`runtime`和`architecture`可以是 null。

trans-unit.source: The task name.
trans-unit.target: 工作名稱。

trans-unit.source: The file path to the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly to load.
trans-unit.target: 要載入的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Optional runtime specifier.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的執行階段的規範。

trans-unit.source: Optional architecture specifier.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的架構規範。

trans-unit.source: Returns the UsingTask element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 UsingTask 項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a parameter for use in a [UsingTask Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) parameter group.
trans-unit.target: 建立用於參數[UsingTask 項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)參數群組。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the parameter to the UsingTask parameter group of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將參數新增到專案中所選擇的 UsingTask 參數群組。

trans-unit.source: The name of the `UsingTask` element.
trans-unit.target: 名稱`UsingTask`項目。

trans-unit.source: Stores outputs from the task in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 在專案檔案中工作的輸出存放區。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined task parameter that contains the parameter value as its value.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的工作參數，其中包含做為其值的參數值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳回參數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a parameter group for a [UsingTask Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 會建立參數群組[UsingTask 項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the parameter group to the UsingTask element of choice in the project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將參數群組加入至專案中所選擇的 UsingTask 項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the parameter group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回參數群組。

trans-unit.source: Creates a [When Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) with a specified Condition attribute.
trans-unit.target: 建立[當項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)具有指定的條件屬性。

trans-unit.source: Caller must add the When element to the location of choice in this project.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將 當此專案中所選擇的位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Condition attribute.
trans-unit.target: 條件屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the When element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回時，項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the DefaultTargets attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 DefaultTargets 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Removes the DefaultTargets attribute if the value to set is an empty string or null.
trans-unit.target: 如果要設定的值為空字串或 null，請移除 DefaultTargets 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the DefaultTargets attribute.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 DefaultTargets 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性不存在，則傳回空字串。

trans-unit.source: Location of the DefaultTargets attribute on this element, if any.
trans-unit.target: DefaultTargets 屬性，這個項目，如果任何上的位置。

trans-unit.source: May not be correct if file is not saved, or file has been edited since it was last saved.
trans-unit.target: 可能無法正確如果檔案不會儲存，或自上次儲存已編輯檔案。

trans-unit.source: Returns the DefaultTargets attribute location.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 DefaultTargets 屬性的位置。

trans-unit.source: If there is no such attribute, returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這類屬性，會傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the directory path to the project file.
trans-unit.target: 取得專案檔的目錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: This method is required for evaluating relative paths.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是為了評估相對路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the directory path, which is never null.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目錄路徑，這不是 null。

trans-unit.source: If the project is not loaded from disk, returns the current-directory at the time the project was loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果專案不從磁碟載入，會傳回目前目錄已載入專案時。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the character encoding that the project file is to be saved in.
trans-unit.target: 指定所要儲存在專案檔的字元編碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns the encoding given by the Xml declaration in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定專案檔中的 Xml 宣告的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: If no encoding is specified, this defaults to UTF 8.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有指定編碼方式時，預設為 UTF-8 8。

trans-unit.source: Returns the character encoding that the project file is to be saved in.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的字元編碼方式，儲存在專案檔。

trans-unit.source: Gets the full path to the project file.
trans-unit.target: 取得專案檔的完整路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full path to the project file.
trans-unit.target: 傳回專案檔的完整路徑。

trans-unit.source: If the project is not loaded from disk, returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果專案不從磁碟載入，則會傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the project has been modified since it was last loaded or saved.
trans-unit.target: 判斷自上次載入或儲存後是否已修改的專案。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the project has been modified; false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果已修改的專案，否則會傳回 truefalse 否則。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child import groups in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中的所有子匯入群組。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the child import groups in this project.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此專案中的所有子匯入群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child import groups in this project, starting with the last group.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中，從最後一個群組中的所有子匯入群組。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the child import groups in this project, starting with the last group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所有子系匯入群組，在此專案中，從最後一個群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child import elements in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中的所有子匯入項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child import elements in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中的所有子匯入項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the InitialTargets attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 InitialTargets 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Removes the InitialTargets attribute if the value to set is an empty string or null.
trans-unit.target: 如果要設定的值為空字串或 null，請移除 InitialTargets 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the InitialTargets attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 InitialTargets 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性不存在，則傳回空字串。

trans-unit.source: Location of the InitialTargets attribute on this element, if any.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目，如果有任何的 InitialTargets 屬性的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns InitialTargets attribute location.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 InitialTargets 屬性的位置。

trans-unit.source: If there is no such attribute, returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這類屬性，會傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child item definition groups in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中所有的子系項目定義群組。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the child item definition groups in this project.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此專案中所有的子系項目定義群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child item definition groups in this project, starting with the last group.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中，從最後一個群組中的所有子系項目定義群組。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the child item definition groups in this project, starting with the last group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此專案中，從最後一個群組中的所有子項目定義群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets all child item definitions in all item definition groups anywhere in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中的任何位置的所有項目定義群組中所有的子系項目定義。

trans-unit.source: Gets all child item definitions in all item definition groups anywhere in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中的任何位置的所有項目定義群組中所有的子系項目定義。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child item groups in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中所有的子系項目群組。

trans-unit.source: Does not include any item groups contained by Choose elements.
trans-unit.target: 不包含所選擇的項目包含任何項目群組。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the child item groups in this project.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此專案中所有的子系項目群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child item groups present in this project, starting with the last group.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有子系項目群組存在於此專案中，從最後一個群組。

trans-unit.source: Does not include any item groups contained by Choose elements.
trans-unit.target: 不包含所選擇的項目包含任何項目群組。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the child item groups present in this project, starting with the last group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所有子系項目群組存在於此專案中，從最後一個群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets all child items in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中的所有子項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns all child items in this project, even if they are contained by Choose elements.
trans-unit.target: 在此專案中，傳回所有子項目，即使它們包含所選擇的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last-write-time of the project file.
trans-unit.target: 取得上次寫入時間的專案檔。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to determine whether a file has been changed on disk by a process other than the MSBuild process.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來判斷是否已變更檔案在磁碟上以外，MSBuild 程序的處理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last-write-time of the project file.
trans-unit.target: 取得上次寫入時間的專案檔。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a project root in the global project collection by loading data from the specified file path.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的檔案路徑載入資料，以初始化全域專案集合中的專案根目錄。

trans-unit.source: May throw InvalidProjectFileException.
trans-unit.target: 可能會擲回 InvalidProjectFileException。

trans-unit.source: The file path to the data.
trans-unit.target: 資料檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the initialized project root.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已初始化的專案根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a project root in the specified project collection by loading data from the specified file path.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的檔案路徑載入資料，初始化指定的專案集合中的專案根目錄。

trans-unit.source: May throw InvalidProjectFileException.
trans-unit.target: 可能會擲回 InvalidProjectFileException。

trans-unit.source: The file path to the data.
trans-unit.target: 資料檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The project collection containing the project to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: 專案集合，包含要初始化專案。

trans-unit.source: Returns the initialized project root.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已初始化的專案根目錄。

trans-unit.source: The location of the originating file itself, not any specific content within it.
trans-unit.target: 起始位置的檔案本身，其中不含任何特定內容。

trans-unit.source: If the file has not been given a name, this is an empty location.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案尚未被授與的名稱，這會是空的位置。

trans-unit.source: This is a legitimate case of having no location.
trans-unit.target: 這是合法的情況下的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the originating file location or an empty location.
trans-unit.target: 傳回原始的檔案位置或空的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child properties in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中的所有子屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns all child properties in this project, even if they are contained by Choose elements.
trans-unit.target: 即使它們包含所選擇的項目，請在此專案中，傳回所有的子屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child property groups in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中的所有子屬性群組。

trans-unit.source: Does not include any item groups contained by Choose elements.
trans-unit.target: 不包含所選擇的項目包含任何項目群組。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the child property groups in this project.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此專案中的所有子屬性群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child property groups present in this project, starting with the last group.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有子屬性群組存在於此專案中，從最後一個群組。

trans-unit.source: Does not include any item groups contained by Choose elements.
trans-unit.target: 不包含所選擇的項目包含任何項目群組。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the child property groups present in this project, starting with the last group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所有子屬性群組存在於此專案中，從最後一個群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML content that represents this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XML 內容，表示這個專案。

trans-unit.source: Does not mark the content as unmodified.
trans-unit.target: 不會標記為未修改狀態的內容。

trans-unit.source: The MSBuild object model provides no other way to access the XML content.
trans-unit.target: MSBuild 物件模型會提供任何其他方法來存取 XML 內容。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML content that represents this project as a string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 XML 內容，表示為字串的這個專案。

trans-unit.source: Saves the project, if modified, to the file system.
trans-unit.target: 如果修改，檔案系統來，儲存專案。

trans-unit.source: Uses the character Encoding returned by the Encoding property.
trans-unit.target: 使用的字元編碼方式屬性所傳回的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Marks the project as unmodified.
trans-unit.target: 將標示為未修改的專案。

trans-unit.source: Saves the project to the specified text writer, whether modified or not.
trans-unit.target: 將專案儲存至指定的文字寫入器，是否修改。

trans-unit.source: Uses the character encoding of the TextWriter.
trans-unit.target: 使用 TextWriter 的字元編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Marks the project as unmodified.
trans-unit.target: 將標示為未修改的專案。

trans-unit.source: The text writer to write the project to.
trans-unit.target: 文字寫入器寫入至專案。

trans-unit.source: Saves the project, if modified or if the file path to storage has changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果修改或儲存體的檔案路徑已變更，請儲存專案。

trans-unit.source: Marks the project as unmodified.
trans-unit.target: 將標示為未修改的專案。

trans-unit.source: The file path to the project in storage.
trans-unit.target: 儲存體中的專案檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: Saves the project, if modified, using the specified character encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果修改使用指定的字元編碼方式，儲存專案。

trans-unit.source: Marks the project as unmodified.
trans-unit.target: 將標示為未修改的專案。

trans-unit.source: The character encoding used to save the project.
trans-unit.target: 字元編碼方式，用來儲存專案。

trans-unit.source: Saves the project, if modified or if the file path to storage has changed.

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified character encoding..
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的字元編碼...

trans-unit.source: The character encoding used to save the project.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the child targets in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得此專案中的所有子目標。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the child targets in this project.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此專案中的所有子目標。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time that this project was last modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得上次修改此專案的時間。

trans-unit.source: Returns the time that this project was last modified.
trans-unit.target: 傳回上次修改此專案的時間。

trans-unit.source: Returns null if the project hasn't been modified since being created or loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果專案未被修改過，因為正在建立或載入，傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the ToolsVersion attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定工具版本屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Removes the ToolsVersion attribute if the value to set is an empty string or null.
trans-unit.target: 如果要設定的值為空字串或 null，請移除工具版本的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ToolsVersion attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 ToolsVersion 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性不存在，則傳回空字串。

trans-unit.source: The location of the ToolsVersion attribute on this element, if any.
trans-unit.target: ToolsVersion 屬性，在這個項目，如果有任何位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ToolsVersion attribute location.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 ToolsVersion 屬性的位置。

trans-unit.source: If there is no such attribute, returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這類屬性，會傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the TreatAsLocalProperty attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 TreatAsLocalProperty 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Removes the TreatAsLocalProperty attribute if the value to set is an empty string or null.
trans-unit.target: 如果要設定的值為空字串或 null，請移除 TreatAsLocalProperty 屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `TreatAsLocalProperty` attribute, see [Project Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Build the Same Source Files with Different Options](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊`TreatAsLocalProperty`屬性，請參閱[專案項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[How to︰ 建置使用不同的選項相同原始程式檔](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the TreatAsLocalProperty attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 TreatAsLocalProperty 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性不存在，則傳回空字串。

trans-unit.source: The location of the TreatAsLocalProperty attribute on this element, if any.
trans-unit.target: 在這個項目，如果有任何 TreatAsLocalProperty 屬性的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the TreatAsLocalProperty attribute location.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 TreatAsLocalProperty 屬性的位置。

trans-unit.source: If there is no such attribute, returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這類屬性，會傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the project root in the global project collection that was loaded into memory from the specified file path.
trans-unit.target: 取得全域專案集合載入到記憶體中從指定的檔案路徑中的專案根目錄。

trans-unit.source: or null if it is not currently in memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果它目前不在記憶體中，為 null。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for ProjectRootElements to be brought into memory and discarded due to memory pressure.
trans-unit.target: 它有可能 ProjectRootElements 帶入記憶體和捨棄由於記憶體不足的壓力。

trans-unit.source: If TryOpen returns null it does not indicate that the project root has never been loaded, only that it is not currently in memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果 TryOpen 傳回 null 它並不代表的專案根目錄永遠不會載入器之後，只有它目前不在記憶體中。

trans-unit.source: The path of the ProjectRootElement, cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: ProjectRootElement 路徑不可為 null。

trans-unit.source: Returns the project root.
trans-unit.target: 傳回專案的根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Returns null if no project was loaded into memory from the specified file path.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何專案載入到記憶體中從指定的檔案路徑，傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the project root in the specified project collection that was loaded into memory from the specified file path.
trans-unit.target: 取得已載入到記憶體中指定的檔案路徑中指定的專案集合中的專案根目錄。

trans-unit.source: or null if it is not currently in memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果它目前不在記憶體中，為 null。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for ProjectRootElements to be brought into memory and discarded due to memory pressure.
trans-unit.target: 它有可能 ProjectRootElements 帶入記憶體和捨棄由於記憶體不足的壓力。

trans-unit.source: If TryOpen returns null it does not indicate that the project root has never been loaded, only that it is not currently in memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果 TryOpen 傳回 null 它並不代表的專案根目錄永遠不會載入器之後，只有它目前不在記憶體中。

trans-unit.source: The path of the ProjectRootElement, cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: ProjectRootElement 路徑不可為 null。

trans-unit.source: The project collection to search for the project root.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的專案根目錄的專案集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the project root.
trans-unit.target: 傳回專案的根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Returns null if no project was loaded into memory from the specified file path.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何專案載入到記憶體中從指定的檔案路徑，傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets all child [UsingTask Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) in this project.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有子項目[UsingTask 項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)此專案中。

trans-unit.source: Returns all child UsingTask elements in this project.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此專案中的所有子 UsingTask 項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version number of this object.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個物件的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: Compare this version number to a stored version number to determine whether the project XML content has changed, even if the project is saved after the change.
trans-unit.target: 比較這個預存的版本號碼，以判斷是否已變更專案的 XML 內容，即使在變更後儲存專案的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: An edit may increment the version number more than once, so Version should only be compared to a stored value.
trans-unit.target: 編輯可能會超過一次，遞增版本號碼，因此應該只與儲存的值相比較版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the version number of this object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個物件的版本號碼。
